test.name: single component consistency java
test.description: Tests whether the consistency model allows a single component to overwrite its own data without reading.

test.name: single component consistency c++
test.description: Tests whether the consistency model allows a single component to overwrite its own data without reading.

test.name: consistency safe java
test.description: Tests whether the consistency model disallows safe overwriting of a working memory entry by 2 different components.
